titleStmt.title: A booke called the Foundacion of rhetorike because all other partes of rhetorike are grounded thereupon, euery parte sette forthe in an oracion vpon questions, verie profitable to bee knowen and redde: made by Richard Rainolde Maister of Arte, of the Uniuersitie of Cambridge. 1563.
Foundacion of rhetorike
titleStmt.author: Rainolde, Richard, d. 1606.

notesStmt.note: Adapted from the Progymnasmata of Aphthonius.--STC.
Identified as STC 20604 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
